full_title: KAKSS Vinyl Coated Dumbbells Set, Hexagon Hand Weights with Non-Slip Grip and Cast-Iron Core for Home Gym Exercise, Available in 0.5kg to 7kg Pairs and Multiple Colors

reasoning.strategy: Integrated top keywords 'dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights', and 'hand weights' naturally into a descriptive title. Featured key product attributes (vinyl coating, hexagon shape, non-slip grip, cast-iron core) and included the full weight range and color variety from the verified facts to appeal to a broad audience searching for home gym equipment.
